Posts.Content: Hi all,back in march i had my annual mammo and the next day she wanted me in there asap found something abnormal so she did ultrasound that day.well she told me to come back in 1 year but now i have found dimpling under breast,it scared me so i have doc appointment wensday to show him but yesterday i bent over the tub and right on and around where the dimpling is pushed against the tub and the pain was so exteme i almost passed out.since then i cant lay on stomach it hurts the right breast is tender.i am past menopause now and breast cancer runs in my family.I heard breast cancer dosent hurt unless its in later stages,i feel weak and tired from adrenal failure to this dont help.Please if you could any ideas.
Posts.Title: dimpling?
